description: Bay Area Surf Bot reports wave, tide and wind conditions for top surf spots near San Francisco, including Mavericks, Ocean Beach and Pacifica, by pulling data from Surfline and Weather Underground.
exampleInteractions: Alexa ask Bay Area Surf Bot how are the waves at Mavericks
Alexa ask Bay Area Surf Bot how's the surf at Ocean Beach
Alexa ask Bay Area Surf Bot what are the conditions at Pacifica
name: Bay Area Surf Bot
shortDescription: Check the wave, tide and wind conditions at top surf spots near San Francisco, including Mavericks, Ocean Beach and Pacifica.
